package.name: DwollaPaymentModule
package.summary: The Dwolla payment extension for Magento - quick, secure integration with the Dwolla money-moving engine.
package.description:
The Dwolla payment module extension for Magento allows your store to quickly, securely integrate with the Dwolla money-mover engine.
Payments are captured in real time as part of the standard checkout process.
Dwolla is a platform for moving funds electronically, and securely. Transactions are completely free for amounts of $10 and under, and cost $0.25 flat-fee for any amount larger than $10.
A customer must have a Dwolla account to pay with Dwolla. Dwolla accounts are free for consumers and merchants.
Dwolla is available for U.S. residents and bank accounts only.
https://www.dwolla.com
package.notes: Added Dwolla error reporting service. This provides Dwolla with non-sensitive data in the event of a fatal error, making it easier for Dwolla to help troubleshoot this extension.
